# Table 1 with `gtsummary`
```{r, echo = FALSE, results='asis'} 
library(dplyr)
library(gtsummary)
library(safetyCharts)

table1 <- knitr::knit_child(
    here::here("demo_gsmpharmaverse", "report_templates", "Table1.Rmd"),
    envir = list(
      table1_params = list(dfADVS = params$dfADVS)
    ),
    quiet = TRUE
  )
cat(table1, sep = "\n")
```
